title: Steak and fries with béarnaise sauce
description: A steak dinner for two made special with a simple, classy dressing.
ingredients: 2 sirloin or tail end fillet steaks, 150-200g/5½-7oz each
2 medium potatoes, peeled and cut into fries using a mandoline
2 tbsp chopped fresh tarragon leaves, stalks reserved
salt and freshly ground black pepper
